content: **crocheted heart for christmas the piece is worked in drops safran ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-267 yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- the heart weighs approx 20 g ----------------------------------------------------------- materials drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g color 19 red the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a lace-sport drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c or the size needed to get 24 double crochets on 10 cm / 4 in width square charted in a 1 measures approx 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
